description: Pasaffe is an easy to use password manager. You can easily copy or view the passwords. The window will be locked after 5 minutes. This can be changed. The clipboard will also be cleared after 5 minutes. There is not special parameter to set the time when the clipboard must be cleared.
summary: Simple and easy to use password manager

description: When launched it didn't find my existing password database. Said it was going to create a new one. No obvious way to get it to bring up a file picker.
NO A LOS PROGRAMAS PROPIETARIOS. SOPLONES.
